text: sum yakubana mrtyu vakhate tame hajara hata, jyare temane potana santanane kahyum ke mara pachi tame koni bandagi karaso? To sau'e javaba apyo ke tamara pujyani ane tamara purvajo ibrahima (a.Sa.) Ane isma'ila (a.Sa.) Ane is'haka (a.Sa.) Na pujyani, je eka ja che ane ame tena ja ajnakari banine rahisum
